description: This file contains environment helper functions for the frontend, including retrieving environment variables, determining API URLs, parsing feature flags, and checking experimental features.

methods.name: getEnv(key, fallback = undefined)
methods.description: Reads a specific environment variable key, returns its trimmed string value or a fallback if unset or empty.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Resolves the base URL for API endpoints from environment variables, prioritizing REACT_APP_API_BASE and then REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL.

methods.name: getFeatureFlags()
methods.description: Parses the REACT_APP_FEATURE_FLAGS environment variable as JSON or a comma-separated list, returning an object mapping feature flags to true.

methods.name: isExperimentsEnabled()
methods.description: Determines if experimental features are enabled based on the REACT_APP_EXPERIMENTS_ENABLED environment variable.
